revised_title: On the Sympathetic Vibrations of Jets and Flames
tldr: The author investigates the sympathetic vibrations of air jets and flames, discovering that certain disturbances can cause the air jet to emit sounds from the flame. The intensity of these sounds depends on the distance from the orifice and the pressure of the air. The author also explains the conditions under which an air jet reproduces different tones and the factors affecting the sound reproduction.
